1.content:
Sam was walking to the university's performance space, known to most as the Art Spot. He hadn't been there in quite a while but was glad to be going back. It was the night of the big Show Choir show where they were showcasing numbers from the musical High Fidelity. Tonight was a big deal to a lot of Sam's friends who were in the show choir so he was very happy when musical director, Anna called him and said that they needed his help. He arrived backstage, waved to a few of his friends before finally spotting Anna. She was beautiful, all made up for the evenings performance, but her and Sam had a troubled history that he'd rather not remember.

"Hey Anna, what's up?"
"Oh thank god you're here Sam! Something dreadful has happened!"

Anna rushed over to Sam and grabbed his arm, dragging him to a back room. In the room sat Sara, Sam wasn't too fond of Sara, she'd always freaked him out a tad.

"Lydia is ill Sam" Anna said bluntly.
"Ok?" Sam replied, a little confused by what was going on.
"She's the star of tonight's show and we need someone to fill in for her and your the only person who isn't already in the show who is covered by our insurance! We need your help."

Sam was taken aback by this, he'd left show choir the previous week as the work seemed to much for him. He looked at Sara who just nodded at him as if to agree with Anna.

"But Lydia is a girl! I can't sing soprano."
"No, but someone using Lydia's body can." Sara said looking at Sam intensely. "I have acquired a small amount of magical talent in my time Sam, I have the power to swap your body with Lydia's."
"Don't be ridiculous, is this why you called me back here? Get a life you two."
You begin to leave whilst Sara quickly mutters something under her breath and yells "WAIT!" Anna then hands you a mirror. "Take a look." You look in the mirror and see Lydia's face staring back at you! You throw the mirror in Shock but Anna catches it.
"What have you done?!" you cry reaching for your face.
"Nothing… yet, that was a small taster of what my power can do." Sara said.
"Come on Sam! You know all the dances, all the songs. It's just for one night please help us." Anna pleaded.

You sat still for a moment. What should you do?

info.description:
75 GIFT POINTS PER GOOD ADDITION!

You are Sam Nicholson, a 21 year old drama student. You were recently involved with your university's show choir but dropped out when it became too much work. You get a call from the director of the show choir on the night of their big show begging you to meet her back stage. Apparently Lydia, the star of the show has turned I'll and they need someone to fill in for her. Sara, a member of the show choir has a power passed down from her family which gives her the ability to perform limited magic. Sara switches yours and Lydia's body for the night so Lydia can shine in your body whilst you wait at home, sick. The only problem is switching back seems to be a bit difficult.

Characters
Sam: you, a smart, goofy young adult who is always willing to help out his friends.
Lydia: a 19 year old girly girl who dreams of being a ballerina.
Anna: director of the show choir and your ex girlfriend.
Sara: odd but friendly witch girl
Brian: Lydia's boyfriend, bit of a dunce.
Olivia: your girlfriend
Terry: your best friend and Male lead in the show choir.
